Description:
Our client is a Construction company. They are now looking for a Mechanical Site Engineer to join them.Roles & ResponsibilitiesPlan and manage all aspects of engineering activities on site, including personnel, materials, and equipment
Prepare construction plans and specifications for projects.
Manage relationships with subcontractors
Estimate costs and materials needed for each project.
Manage the ordering of materials and equipment needed for each project.
Oversee subcontractors working on the project site. Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
Previous experience in Health Care Construction Projects.
Excellent Command of English level.
Experience In Managing Site projects.
Dealing with different Nationalities.
